website_summaries.verdict: A very well-made mat with over 8,000 acupressure points.
pros: Similar to acupuncture in that you receive tactile therapy with rounded plastic "nails."
place it on a bed, chair, couch, or the floor
cons: More expensive than some other mats, though many users swear by its benefits

customer_reviews.title: So excited to finally have one of these mats
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one of these mats for ages. I was a little surprised when I first unpackaged it as it was smaller than I expected. This brand's full-size mat is about the same size as other brand's foot mats. However, I just place it on my yoga mat and lie down on it and it's still the right size to cover my entire back and shoulders. I love using it and don't find it too sharp. My husband and kids all want to use it, too. The quality seems excellent. I chose this brand as it was one of the best-known and recommended, and had a high ratio of plastic points (better quality, less pain).
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Steph

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: I cant really blame anyone except myself for this purchase. First off, it LOOKS like its full size in the picture, like almost the size of a sleeping bag. But its NOT. It is the size of a pillow. So i paid $80 for this thing. Next, I tried to return it and it states that it is NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN. Maybe i am overlooking it but I cant seem to find ANYTHING anywhere on the whole page that says it cannot be returned. I am beyond pissed right now. So now im stuck with this 80$ p.o.s. Again, MY FAULT. NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product but you shouldn't have to over pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this several years ago and I still speak highly about the product. It's very relaxing and hopefully it helps keep me healthy. However I see in several years the price has doubled. Not sure why it costs so much more now. Shop around, its a great product but you shouldn't have to over pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend since he use to always complain about back pain. Ever since he started using this his back pain has disappeared and he sleeps better. I recommend this to anyone who plays sports or lifts heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Inez Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat, however, I'm not sure it is worth the price- which is why I only gave 4 stars. I would shop around, but I really do love this mat (and the pillow, sold separately).
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mat really help relax me and relieves sciatic nerve pain in my right leg.
customer_reviews.author: lee thomas

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stress and anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Helps you sleep if you have lots of stress and anxiety in your life before bed.
customer_reviews.author: jyk

customer_reviews.title: Helps to relax
customer_reviews.text: I like it...a lot, but it is not for everyone. You have to get used to the spiky sensation, but after couple minutes it truly helps to relax your muscles. Afterwards you can feel the blood flushing all over your back, it is a very weird sensation, but I like it before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: ChristelleV

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This truly does help me to relax! My husband uses it when his back hurts & he swears by it. We also have the pillow, my sis-in-law used it while visiting us one day when she had a terrible headache. After taking medicine that didn't help her, I suggested she try our pillow. After 15 min she was pain free! My father-in-law also loved the "bed". We got him one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The bed of nails is uncomfortable and really does not alleviate the pain in the manner I expected it to based on the hype of the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, you can barely feel the pressure, also you are NOT able to return this. DON'T waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: colette

customer_reviews.title: great muscle relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I use this to release my upper back and neck muscles. It seems to work wonderfullly.
customer_reviews.author: John Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Order not delivered
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I never received my package. It was intended to be a gift. That's the reason for 1 star. Otherwise, its a great product of you have it. I have another one that I use myself, and I really like it. Whenever I have a sore back, I lay down on the mat and feel much better afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I did not expect it to work. but not I am using it every day to avoid the chronicle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mur

customer_reviews.title: Chronic pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have struggled with upper back pain for many years, while this is just a temporary fix, it is the only fix that has proven to be able to distract my mind from the pain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kelly miller

customer_reviews.title: Bed of Nail treatment
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product does not allow return. This product does not perform as it is described.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Decent mat but overpriced. You would be better off getting a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Rogvi Dragaberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Helps me feel so relaxed!! It's a must try
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: OVER RATED  AMAZON SHOULD NOT CARRY THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.text: BED OF NAILS IS OVER RATED , FEEL NO NAILS . I WOULD NOT RATE A STAR WITH BED OF NAILS . I WOULD NOT GIVE THIS AS A GIFT
customer_reviews.author: CHANTAL LEE

customer_reviews.title: Try it on a mattress or chair first if you think you might find the mat too intense when on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad that I purchased this for my back. It really helps at the end of a long day to lie on it. FYI: I place it on top of a yoga mat, and as a result, I really feel the pressure of the plastic nails, which is what I want. One can also place it on the mattress or a chair, which allows more "give" and as a result, the pressure is less intense.
customer_reviews.author: aminla

customer_reviews.title: It works for me and about 90% of the people I've shared it with.
customer_reviews.text: It works for me and about 90% of the people I've shared it with. Take it with me on trips when I have space.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item
customer_reviews.text: My wife received hers as a gift and uses this item daily. She is so impressed that her high praise has caused 4 of her friends to purchase their own. I know it certainly has made her ability to sleep much better though stress relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It's helpful to relax my back and calm my mind. The make quality is pretty good and I love its green color.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It's Strange but Good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy laying on my Bed of Nails, I have a bad back and it seems to give some relief. On top of that Dr. Oz says it good to use for some weight loss, and that I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my son this year. He's into acupuncture and yoga, and I thought he would appreciate it. He thought it was very cool and enjoys using it. I've asked him to bring it by so I can try it too :)
customer_reviews.author: SageFox

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh  peace
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I was a little skeptical at first but I find this so totally relaxing. I think the trick is to ease down onto it rather than plop but that's all one has to remember. It is very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Bed of nails
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was longer I do suffer with extreme back pain it's a little pricey but it does feel good one you get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Bed of nails is a wonderful product, for anyone who has stress that leads to pains in your back or neck area, this item will help, at first it may feel like it will hurt you but it won't. Thank you very much :>)
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Does not do much for me
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this after the great reviews, but I don't notice a difference in how I feel after using it.
customer_reviews.author: CarlyandDylan

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat - very effective at reducing back pain. It's not that sharp and is quite comfortable to lie on. This is a go to for me on nights that I'm tossing and turning for extended periods of time. However, I'd caution you not to fall asleep on it :) I once did and ended up scratching my elbow pretty badly somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for about 30 minutes everyday. So relaxing. Takes a little bit to get use to it
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: not sure
customer_reviews.text: so it wasn't worth sending back but not sure how I will use this. I saw it advertised in one of my fitness magazines as a way to help improve circulation and relieve back pain. the little plastic spikes are a little irritating and I can't stand it more than a few minutes. it actually makes me feel itchy as opposed to feeling any relief.
customer_reviews.author: mom12

customer_reviews.title: Bed of nails
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent, helps relieves stress and relax. Its a litlle painful when you start using it,but after a week you can literally fall asleep on mat.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing experience that really helps de-stress the mind and body. Everyone should have this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Bed of nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself one 3 years ago and love it bought 2 for friends and they love it also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: wish it came in a larger size. i'd like it 4 circles wider and 4-10 rows longer. recommended by a friend. like it!
customer_reviews.author: sizzle

customer_reviews.title: Someone recommended I try this because they had heard great reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended I try this because they had heard great reviews about it. Unless this was made for people who do not have serious back pain, I don't see how this mat could be effective. I tried it on a few occasions and it either didn't work at all, or made no difference after use. Either way, I got in pain. If you have serious back issues try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dione L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Bed of Nails Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item. I have herniated disk problems with my back and this mat helps me deal with the chronic pain. When I lay on it initially it is uncomfortable but after about 5 minutes the pain subsides and I feel so comfortable I can fall asleep on the mat. Anyone with back troubles should try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how all the rave reviews originated about this product. It is mildly relaxing if you lie on top without any clothes on, with clothes on I can't hardly feel the needles and overall it does not do anything to your condition. It does not worsen it, but it does not help either. I have been using it consistently before going to bed, but can't say I have noticed any difference in my back pain, and I don't even have any serious condition, just some knots, like most people who work long hours before a computer. So, I regret purchasing it based on other people's reviews. Should have returned before the deadline passed. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Danielian

customer_reviews.title: dont know if it actually works but the cheapest option ...
customer_reviews.text: dont know if it actually works but the cheapest option if you want something to throw in your car seat to try to fight cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: kitteh

customer_reviews.title: Bed of Nails Mat
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me so much with my back pain instead of pain meds. As soon as the pain comes I get my mat out and stay on it for about ten minutes and I am good to go. If I don't get relief right away with a a thin t-shirt on then I lay directly on it. It actually helps me to get to sleep quicker and easier. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bketelhut

customer_reviews.title: This has changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I’ve sufferd from lower back and neck pain since I was a child and this has been an absolute game changer. No more expensive and time consuming physical therapy! I use the mat and pillow when I get up in the morning and I before I go to bed at night. I also stand on the mat at least once a day for a couple minutes. My pain has gone from an 8 to a 2. I can’t recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great Feeling!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to end a stressful day by relaxing on the mat. Your body experiences so many different great sensations but they all subside to take you to a better place quickly. I am glad that this is a part of my relaxation techniques.
customer_reviews.author: LORETTA KING

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of acupressure mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats and use mine daily. I have purchased other brands that were not as comfortable and had to return. I love giving them as gifts. Stick with this brand and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkiesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lupus Relief
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a very welcome relief and comfort. It helps to lessen the muscle pain I experience on a very frequent basis from lupus.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was going to like this but I had to give it a try. I am hooked, my husband is hooked and keeps ' borrowing ' I am going to have to buy him his own! I sleep like an angel after laying on it for about 20 min! LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine, the product is definitely something to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine, the product is definitely something to get used to...but with regular use I feel like it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Colina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Terrific. Really helps me to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: AJ in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing mat
customer_reviews.text: I 'm a skinny person but didn't feel uncomfortable on this mat. I'm glad that my daughters 8 and 10 love to use it to.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Killer product
customer_reviews.text: I suggest that you clear some time before you climb aboard. I have fallen asleep on this mat EVERY time that I use it. It's super relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Hoku Kaauwai

customer_reviews.title: Get this....now
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for back pain relief or any kind of indigestion. My whole family uses it. I especially like meditating while laying on it, it helps tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I find this very relaxing and found I sleep better when I use it, problem is I forget to get it out and use it. Very please with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: A product that works wonders for your well-being
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR ANYONE WHO HAS BACK PROBLEMS OR JUST NEEDS TO RELAX.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of issues with tension headaches, knotted shoulders, etc. I was desperate enough to try this before turning to things like botox injections or muscle relaxers. I was really afraid that this would be uncomfortable, but it feels great. I often fall asleep while on it and I have noticed that my tension headaches and migraines are decreasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of getting used to but it does help relax me. I worked up to lying on it without anything in between me and the 'nails'.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Patterson

customer_reviews.title: harmful but helpful :)
customer_reviews.text: Good product after you get used to lying on it, it's really sharp. Also the sizing is not the best, I have to change position at least three times before it covers all my body parts
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: This is so relaxing! I look forward to winding ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so relaxing! I look forward to winding down my day on my Bed of Nails.
customer_reviews.author: Supersweetk

customer_reviews.title: Foam insert yellowed after several months
customer_reviews.text: I love this and have been using it for several months. However, recently the foam insert has yellowed; this tells me that the foam is NOT non-toxic nor free from harmful chemicals. While it is protected from the cover, it is still somewhat concerning since it claims to be free of toxic chemicals (what else is lurking around?). Additionally, it looks pretty gross as you can see the newly turned yellow foam thru the top where the cover closes with Velcro tabs. Otherwise an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Alexander

customer_reviews.title: First pain relief in years
customer_reviews.text: I have built up to using this for 30-40 minutes a day and usually fall asleep on it. The tension and muscle spasms are relieved in waves. My massage therapist is amazed as she has been trying to help me with this for 10 years. I am still trying to master getting on and off the mat but once on it I don't want it to stop! Also working on getting the mat to my upper shoulders...that is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: amadolla

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product but it didn't come with the bag from the picture so that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helps me relax
customer_reviews.text: The mat really does help you relax. After a long day at the computer at work my neck and back often ache. Laying on the mat and pillow releases the stress and pain.
customer_reviews.author: MarkW3

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WISE PURCHASE, AT LEAST FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Ugh...a unique idea, and I tried to love it, but after using it for a while, gave up. Think it will be a flash in the pan...spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really n otice any difference after using this for a week or so....except that I just didn't care for lying on it.
customer_reviews.author: JPT

customer_reviews.title: Beware..NONRETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on lightning deals, and thought it would be worth a try since it had primarily positive reviews. Not only did I get NO results from the mat, it can't be returned because it's considered a personal health item. The non-returnable part never occurred to me, but I will be more careful in the future. The mat sounded too good to be true in the reviews, and that should have been a clue.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

product_meta.title: Bed of Nails, Pink Original Acupressure Mat for Back/Body Pain Treatment, Relaxation, Mindfulness
feature_bullets: AFFORDABLE ACUPRESSURE MAT: Effective and affordable treatment for back pain, neck pain, arthritis aches and pains, insomnia and more!
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: BON’s modern design allows the mat to trigger the body’s self-healing mechanisms for radiant health.
CONVENIENT PACKAGING: Allowing you to experience the health and meditation benefits of acupressure anywhere.

PROVIDES LASTING EFFECTS: BON’s mat lowers the “stress hormone” cortisol while releasing endorphins (or “feel good hormones”), creating an overall more positive and relaxed state of mind that lasts throughout your day.
EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN: BON’s sleek and effortless design makes cleaning easy! Simply brush with detergent, rinse and hang dry.
